settings.heading: HEAR THE BASS, NOT THE NOISE
settings.subheading: Revolutionary open-ear headphones for all-day comfort and immersive sound.

settings.heading: Open-Ear Comfort
settings.subheading: FORGET YOU'RE WEARING THEM. No buds in your ear, no pain, no pressure.

settings.heading: Superior Sound
settings.subheading: HEAR THE DIFFERENCE. Patented technology delivers deep, rich bass you can feel.

settings.heading: All-Day Battery
settings.subheading: GO FOR WEEKS, NOT DAYS. Up to 58 hours of total playtime.

settings.question: Are they suitable for running and workouts?
settings.answer: Absolutely. The patented open-ear design and skin-friendly silicone ensure a secure and comfortable fit, even during intense workouts. The IPX4 waterproof rating also protects them from sweat.

settings.question: Can I connect to multiple devices at once?
settings.answer: The Oladance OWS Pro supports Bluetooth 5.3 but does not officially support multipoint connection to two devices simultaneously. For this feature, please consider the OWS 2 model.

settings.question: How does the open-ear design affect sound leakage?
settings.answer: Our sound leakage control technology minimizes sound leakage, ensuring your music and calls remain private in most environments. In very quiet settings, some sound may be audible to those in close proximity.
